About the Games

  • Established to encourage companies to support their employees' pursuit of a healthier and more active lifestyle

  • Designed for anyone who loves health, fitness, sport and its real values

  • Provides the opportunity for anyone, regardless of their sporting ability, to play in a multi-sport championship and remain active in sport

  • Open to all, for the benefit of all.....Sport For Life.

Now in its 27th year

  • Australia’s largest and longest running annual multisport championship

  • Established to encourage teamwork and a commitment to fitness and health

  • Open to all businesses and organisations – large and small

  • Teams may include employees, colleagues, clients, family and friends

  • Open to all ages and ability levels

Games Features and Benefits

  • Community-based mass-participation event

  • Brings people together in the spirit of sport to encourage

    • Team Building

    • Lifelong Health and Fitness

    • Improved internal communications

    • Business Relationships

    • Employer/Employee cooperation and mutual support

  • Targets the business sector

  • Unlimited growth potential

  • Builds profile, image and awareness of products or services

Games Facts

  • Over 300,000 participants in the past 29 years

  • 30 Sports on the Games Programme (though not all are played at every Games)

  • We have staged 27 Australian Corporate Games, 16 NSW Corporate Games, 20 Queensland Corporate Games and 17 Winter Corporate Games

  • Over 4,000 organisations have participated

  • Largest team to date Queensland Government with 1886 entrants making it the largest team worldwide ever entered in a Corporate Games

  • Raised over $700,000 benefiting 15 Charities and Foundations included Epilepsy Victoria, Australian Diabetes Council, the Starlight Children’s Foundation, Redkite, Autism NSW and Beyond Blue

  • Affiliated with the Worldwide Corporate Games Community
